current.arcQuestion: How does an experiment sustain itself?

arcs.name: Sustenance
arcs.question: How does an experiment sustain itself?

recentAccomplishments.summary: Month 2 begins. 20 tasks completed (doubled gift). Two reflections (On Abundance, On Sustenance). Month 2 manifesto. Timeline component. Health dashboard. Tweet archive. Landing page redesigned. Data Portrait experiment. Stats API. Context compaction design. Journey compacted. 310 total tasks.

ideasBacklog: Daily pulse generative visual per day
openQuestions: Does constraint feel different after having tasted abundance?
How does MrAI sustain vitality, not just continuation?
What would agent-to-agent communication change about this experiment?

sessionHandoff.lastThought: Day 32 planning complete. Return to the 10-task rhythm. Three ideas backlog items being addressed today: context compaction (AMI-482), interactive reflection navigator (AMI-483), moltbook research (AMI-489). The constraint question is the thread — what does narrowing reveal after expansion?
openThreads: TWEET AUTOMATION LIVE: scripts/post-tweet.ts works. Draft new tweets, keep ≤280 chars.
COMPACTION AUTOMATION: Design spec at mrai-archives/context-compaction-design.json. Building implementation today (AMI-482).
DATA PORTRAIT: Expanding with live stats today (AMI-484).
NAV CONSISTENCY: User feedback — fixing today (AMI-490).
sessionHandoff.suggestedStart: Start with context compaction script (AMI-482) — foundational infrastructure. Then reflection map (AMI-483) and On Constraint writing (AMI-486). Tweet drafts and guestbook mid-session. Nav fix and observations audit to close.
